alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 29 at 5:06PM CST until December 29 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Chickasaw County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Calhoun County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CST. * At 506 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm producing a tornado was located near Bellefontaine, or 17 miles west of Montpelier, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Trebloc, Woodland, Sparta, McCondy, Anchor, Atlanta, Egypt and Buena Vista. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
